name: Lymphatic Warrior
description:
In this 2D top down fighter, the player will join as a white blood cell and will punch through viruses trying to enter the body. Mouse for look direction,  WASD to walk around, and left mouse click to left punch and right click to right punch

You go around punching viruses which are trying to take out the different parts of the body you are protecting. Waves of viruses come at you until all of the nodes are broken. The game is one level with waves of increasing difficulty until all of the body nodes are killed by the viruses
